title: Blood Trap
description: All around the Badin Lake area, Bigfoot sightings are becoming more frequent and twenty-five year olds are ending up as missing persons. When a search party led by the father of one of the victims starts to solve this mystery, they find that there's something undoubtedly supernatural going on. Meanwhile, the newest victims find themselves being tortured in what seems like hell on earth and it looks like the terror will never endâ€¦Releasing October 31, 2014
author: Miley Styles
